title: The Forest
description: A survival horror game where you fend off cannibals and explore mysterious caves.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game where players can build, explore, and survive in a blocky world.

title: Among Us
description: A multiplayer party game where you and your friends work together to find the Impostor among the crew.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An open-world RPG where you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, in a vast medieval fantasy world.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game where you can explore, complete missions, and commit crimes.

title: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where players compete to be the last squad standing.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: A free-to-play battle royale game set in the Call of Duty universe with fast-paced combat and tactical gameplay.

title: Valorant
description: A tactical first-person shooter that blends precise gunplay and unique character abilities.

title: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based first-person shooter with colorful heroes and unique abilities, offering diverse gameplay strategies.

title: League of Legends
description: A multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) where two teams of five players compete to destroy each other's Nexus.

title: Rocket League
description: A vehicular soccer game where players control rocket-powered cars to score goals.
